Why AVI? AVI is more player compatible with other devices. To convert an MKV into an AVI is a real mess, MP4 is better than MKV, but if you have a small error in the file, it is pretty much ruined.

On the other hand an AVI can be easily converted into any file format, and is the most reliable compressed movie format. Also most devices can read AVI
